data.text:
Carlton Tower Hotel Dubai

Dubai

Worst ever Hotel stay

1) I check in and go straight to freshen up and to my surprise there's no outlet to fill the bath tub but a shower over the tub with water pressure so low that it could take hours to fill it up,  They refused to do anything about it.
2) The only shower i could use was overhead in the tub, at one point the tub got so slippery I almost lost my balance.
3) Door won't lock on its own if left to close, so I called the maintenance the guy who say I need to bang the door for it to lock. So anyone could have entered if I forgot close the door with a bang.
4) Rooms were non smoking but the second floor lobby was filled with smell of second hand sheesha smoke, it was so bad just walking from lift to room would give you headache, when complained someone sprayed cheap room freshener, and it's the same the next day or even in next few hours.
5) Worst location in Dubai, you'd find scammy massage card all across the street. Even my coworkers advised never stay in the area or hotel.
6) Everyday for next 14 days, 14days when ever I came back to hotel in the evening the key card stopped working and had to go back to reception to have it fixed.
7) they have swiming pool on second floor and a guest can be in the pool area unless they buy something from hotel room service menu, well if that was advertised somewhere I'd know better, for I had worst ever interaction with the hotel staff. Who was boderline hostile asking to place and order or leave. I am like dude I just sat down let me have 5mins to get my thoughts together after long day on meetings, not a chance. Insane. Same night inanswered the survey and mentioned this incident and every hotel staff wanted to know what happened but didn't offer any feedback on what they did on the complaint
8) Finally the last night of my stay I had to ask hotel reception to break a 500 AED currency note and they gave me a fakes. Which got me detained by Dubai Police at Dubai airport when trying to buy something from the duty free store.

I immediately emailed the hotel and all I ever heard back was we will investigate and get back to you and nothing since.

I stayed there from Nov 29 2023 to Dec 12 2023

Don't ever stay at the hotel and never exchange any currency for sure.
The claim to have currency scanner and still gave me fakes. So it was probably done on purpose by the man on the reception desk. 

To conclude it was a horific stay ever
data.title: horific hotel stay ever

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 
Thank you for your feedback and we have communicated about this on our direct mails as well. 
Assuring you of our best.
Kind Regards,
Vidya Adams
Cluster Director of Operations
owner_response.author: Vidya adams

data.text:
My recent stay at Carlton Tower Hotel in Dubai was truly exceptional. Situated in the heart of Dubai, the hotel offers easy access to the Baniyas Metro Station, making it convenient for exploring the city.

The staff at Carlton Tower Hotel were exemplary in their professionalism, kindness, and support throughout my stay. I want to extend my sincere gratitude to Lorie and May, the receptionists, for their outstanding service and consideration. Their dedication truly made my stay memorable.

Overall, I highly recommend Carlton Tower Hotel for its prime location, excellent service, and attentive staff. Thank you to the entire team for making my experience unforgettable. Thousand thanks indeed!
data.title: The exceptional stay at carton tower hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ehsun ,
Thank you for recommending The Carlton Tower Hotel after the experience you had with us! We are proud to know that you enjoyed our polite staff, service and accessible location. Our team would like to express our gratitude for your positive comments, and we would love to have the chance to welcome you back in the nearest future.

Kind Regards,
Vidya Adams
Cluster Director of Operations
owner_response.author: Vidya adams

data.text:
The room is good, clean and large enough to stay 3person(2adults and a 8 years old child. 
Staff are very kind, helpful and very friendly with kids.

If you are a drinking person, I recommend you to have few drinks at the bar which is in first floor of the hotel. A young, polite and very professional bartender, MAX, will be there to serve you from evening to 3am. Max is very friendly and nice guy.
data.title: Very friendly

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 839htetp,
Thank you for recommending The Carlton Tower Hotel after the experience you had with us! We are very glad to receive your compliments about your room and our staff. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back at The Carlton Tower Hotel in the nearest future.
Kind Regards,
Vidya Adams,
Cluster Director of Operations.
owner_response.author: Vidya adams

data.text:
One of the best hotel, value for money with nice cordial staff.

Breakfast was good with wide spread.

Rooms are spaciaous with nice decor & utmost comfort.

Location is best near metro station & with beautiful creek view.

Maintaince is excellent with utmost care.
data.title: Excellent

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Let us thank you for choosing The Carlton Tower Hotel for your stay and we are glad we were able to meet and exeed your expectations. We are pleased to note that you enjoyed the comforts of our hotel including view, breakfast, hotel, staff and location. We would love to have the chance to welcome you back in Dubai for another stay.
Best regards,
Vidya Adams,
Cluster Director of Operations
owner_response.author: Vidya adams

data.text:
The attitude of the staff, especially Mr. Max  was excellent. The only weakness of the hotel is that it does not have a laundry service, and huge sums are charged for washing clothes, and the cost of the hotel is also very high.
Young and energetic Filipino man (Mr. Max) Thank you again
data.title: Becuse of beeing neer city town the hotel located in good place

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear shahramm,
We appreciate that you have taken the time to write a review for The Carlton Tower Hotel. It is always pleasant to know that our guests appreciate our quality of service and that we are able to fully meet your expectations. The feedback on laundry is well noted but as it is outsourced the rates cannot be comparable to our own laundry if we had one. However, it has been cascaded to the Management for resolutions. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.
Kind Regards,
Vidya Adams
Cluster Director of Operations
owner_response.author: Vidya adams
